Token.Abstract: This factory class is used for creating the data model class based on the enum used in enumList.h for the type of application operation needed. The idea is to use a factory for creating the class and using polymorphic behavior.
This class method requires an integer from enumList.h and creates a DeviceData class appropriate to the operation described.

Parameter.Name: formType
Parameter.Abstract: An integer for one of the operations, Add, Alter, Replace, and Remove devices.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An instance of a DeviceData class which conforms to the ConfigurationDataProtocol.
